Posts.Content: Hi I had bil masectomy 3 years ago since then I have had about 4 different surgeries my concern is the pain my left arm and neck hurt a lot. I have seen surgent and oncologist. I had mentioned a couple of times that under the left arm it feels swollen and lot of pain in back of arm and neck my oncologist said have you ever heard of exercise ? I never had this before surgery and I 'm 5'3 154 pounds  Jan of 2008 after surgery they thought I was having a heart attack because the pain was so bad.  sherri
Posts.Title: left arm and chest pain
